name: RobotArena
description:
A simple top-down arena shooter thing made for the 2021 College Game Jam!

Run around, avoid the wizards and guards, and be sure to keep your energy topped up with batteries scattered around!

*Potentially many many more bugs, but shouldn't kill the fun, if otherwise, leave a comment!*

Controls:

WASD: Movement
Mouse Left: Standard Laser
Mouse Right: Piercing Laser
'R': Restart (In case anything explodes/you want to reset :3 )
